targets.query: SELECT mean("status") FROM "services_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /.*/ AND "service" = 'sshd.service' OR "service" = 'ssh.service') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("status") FROM "services_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /.*/ AND "service" = 'sshd.service' OR "service" = 'ssh.service') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT mean("status") FROM "services_stats" WHERE ("host" =~ /.*/ AND "service" = 'sshd.service' OR "service" = 'ssh.service') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "host" fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_recv"), 1s) *8 FROM "net" WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" = 'vmx0') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)
SELECT derivative(mean("bytes_sent"), 1s) *8 FROM /^$Interval$/ WHERE ("host" =~ /^$host$/ AND "interface" = 'ens161') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($Interval) fill(null)

list.name: service
list.query: SHOW TAG FROM $host where VALUES WITH KEY = "service"  WHERE host =~ /$host/

list.name: Interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "interface" WHERE host =~ /$host/

list.name: Disk
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "name" WHERE host =~ /$host/
